mapper.insert: INSERT ALL INTO board (seq, name, id, email, subject, content, hit, logtime, bcode) VALUES (#{seq}, #{name}, #{id}, #{email}, #{subject}, #{content}, 0, sysdate, #{bcode}) INTO reboard (rseq, seq, ref, lev, step, pseq, reply) VALUES (reboard_rseq.nextval , #{seq}, #{ref}, 0, 0, 0, 0) SELECT * FROM dual
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM board b join reboard r ON b.seq = r.ref AND b.seq = #{value}

SELECT b.* FROM( SELECT rownum rn, a.* FROM( SELECT b.seq, b.name, b.email, b.subject, b.content, b.hit, b.bcode, decode(to_char(b.logtime, 'yymmdd'), to_char(sysdate, 'yymmdd'), to_char(b.logtime, 'hh24:mi.ss'), to_char(b.logtime, 'yy.mm.dd')) logtime, r.rseq, r.ref, r.lev, r.step, r.pseq, r.reply FROM board b JOIN reboard r ON b.seq = r.seq AND b.bcode = #{bcode} ORDER BY b.seq DESC) a WHERE rownum <= #{end} ) b WHERE b.rn > ${start}
